name: todoapp
heading: Todo App.
content: The application is a mini copy of Trello. We have the ability to create boards, lists, tasks, move tasks and lists using the DragAndDrop system.

name: phoneshop
heading: Phone shop.
content: A small e-shop project written at the beginning of React learning. Managing the state of the application using ContextAPI, style with Styled-components.

name: staticpage
heading: Evolo page.
content: It was one of the first pages written in html and css (sass). While writing the project, I was learning the Sass preprocessor.
